entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
